EmailTemplate.description: Quarterly survey to get partner feedback & NPS - Final reminder
EmailTemplate.name: 18-03 Quarterly Partner Survey_Final Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Complete this survey to win $100
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Help us help you.
As a reminder, we are seeking your feedback on our partnership through this survey: https://www.getfeedback.com/r/6nOG8T31
If you complete your survey by close of business tomorrow (3/30), you will be eligible to win a $100 Visa Gift Card! Winners to be announced on Monday (4/2).
We will be following up with you on a quarterly basis to ensure you receive the support that you need as we continue to work together to help customers go solar. Questions? Call: (888) 817-2703 Email: PartnerSupport@bluewavesolar.com
Thank you!
- BlueWave Partner Support
